nodes.title: First Day of School
content: The school is buzzing with energy. You spot your friend Leo by the lockers.

nodes.title: Conversation with Leo
content: Leo asks about your weekend and the task from Mr. Harrison.
Player can choose a dialogue option about how it went.

nodes.title: Jane Sighting
content: As you're talking, you see Jane—the girl from the beach—down the hall. She smiles and waves.
This is a key moment for establishing the relationship route.
